name: Toxic Phish
description:
A simple game where you have to feed your ship toxins so its weird alien technology can fix itself.

PS. A lot of the games polish and sound fx isnt in there because of 2 reasons, 1 i was alone during this, 2 i had less than 30 hours to work on this jam due to being away, a lot of criticism is on its way from players, and its welcome, but please do mind that.
